Event.name: Repayment
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Debtor</fen> gives a <fen>Loaner</fen> <fen>Money</fen> in return for having borrowed <fen>Money</fen> at an earlier time. Alternatively, the type of <fen>Loan</fen> can be expressed as the object of repayment.
<ex><fex name="Debtor">I</fex> am <t>paying</t> <t>back</t> <fex name="Money">$2,000</fex> <fex name="Loan">of my student loan</fex> <fex name="Loaner">to the government</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Loaner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who is owed <fen>Money</fen> by the <fen>Debtor</fen>.
<ex>If you borrow, you'll have to <t>repay</t> <fex name="Loaner">the bank</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Debtor
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who is giving <fen>Money</fen> to the <fen>Loaner</fen> to return an earlier borrowed amount.
<ex><fex name="Debtor">I</fex> <t>paid</t> Johnson <t>back</t> for the movie ticket.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Money
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The amount of <fen>Money</fen> that the <fen>Debtor</fen> gives to the <fen>Loaner</fen>, which may or may not be the full amount of the <fen>Loan</fen>.
<ex><t>Pay</t> me ba<t></t>ck <fex name="Money">my 20 dollars</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Loan
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A situation or a representative of a situation prior to repayment in which the <fen>Debtor</fen> uses the <fen>Loaner</fen>'s money.
<ex>You must <t>repay</t> <fex name="Loan">the mortgage</fex> in full.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The level to which the Loan can be considered repaid in its entirety.
<ex>He wishes to <fex name="Degree">completely</fex> <t>repay</t> the loan.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>When the <fen>Debtor</fen> gives the <fen>Loaner</fen> money.
<ex>Don't worry, I'll <t>pay</t> you <t>back</t> <fex name="Time">later</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the world when the <fen>Money</fen> is transfered.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>How the <fen>Debtor</fen> gives <fen>Money</fen> to the <fen>Loaner</fen>.
<ex>Paul <fex name="Manner">quietly</fex> <t>repaid</t> all of his debts and skipped town.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The physical location where the repayment takes place.
<ex>They <t>repaid</t> Lenny <fex name="Place">in a dark alleyway</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>What the <fex name="">Debtor</fex> does in order to repay the <fex name="">Loaner</fex>.
<ex>I <t>repaid</t> my loan by mowing their lawn once a week.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: repay.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to give money to someone in return for a prior loan

lexUnit.name: repayment.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of giving money to return a debt

lexUnit.name: pay back.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to give money to someone in return for a loan
